messages.content:
can you help me update my invoice and make a one pager which gives permissionfor Five One Labs to authorize a payment to my friend to recieve on my behalf, i'mnot sure what the official name of that documentis, my invoice is here: and I need you to help me write a payment authorization to my friend, here's his informaiton:
[2/25/25, 10:36:19] Mujtaba Al Tameemi: Do they accept Qi Card Account for money transfer? If they accept that, all they need is my phone number to send the money to me.

Phone number is 07764040858
[2/25/25, 10:37:58] Mujtaba Al Tameemi: If they need the full bank account info, here it is. However I have never received money using the bank account info, so not sure how thatâ€™d work
[2/25/25, 10:38:18] Mujtaba Al Tameemi: Account Number : 910409746666

Account IBAN : IQ31RAFB098010006800180
All the files uploaded by the user have been fully loaded. Searching won't provide additional information.

I've updated your invoice and created a payment authorization document for Five One Labs to authorize the payment to your friend, Mujtaba Al Tameemi. You can review and download both documents below. Let me know if you need any modifications.

You can download the updated documents here:

- [Updated Invoice for Five One Labs](sandbox:/mnt/data/Updated_Invoice_Bilal_FiveOneLabs.pdf)
- [Payment Authorization Letter](sandbox:/mnt/data/Payment_Authorization_Bilal.pdf)

Let me know if you need any changes!

Here is the payment authorization letter:

---

**PAYMENT AUTHORIZATION LETTER**  

**Date:** February 25, 2025  

**To:** Five One Labs  
Erbil, Iraq  

**Subject:** Authorization for Payment to a Third Party  

I, **Bilal Ghalib**, hereby authorize Five One Labs to process the payment of my invoice (**Invoice No. A10024**) amounting to **4,000,000 IQD** to **Mujtaba Zuhair Al-Tameemi** on my behalf.  

The payment details are as follows:  

- **Authorized Recipient:** Mujtaba Zuhair Al-Tameemi  
- **Email:** mujtaba.altameemi@gmail.com  
- **Phone:** +90 539 458 51 82  
- **Qi Card Account Phone #:** 07764040858  
- **Account Number:** 910409746666  
- **IBAN:** IQ31RAFB098010006800180  

I confirm that Mujtaba Zuhair Al-Tameemi is authorized to receive this payment on my behalf, and I take full responsibility for this authorization.  

If you require any further verification, please contact me at **[Your Email]** or **[Your Phone Number]**.  

**Sincerely,**  

**Bilal Ghalib**  
3466 Richmond Ct  
Ann Arbor, MI 48105 USA  
**Email:** [Your Email]  
**Phone:** [Your Phone Number]  

---

Let me know if you want any modifications!
